jd: Hope you are doing well My name is Saurabh. And I am a Technical Recruiter at Technocraft Solutions LLC. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Role: Release Train Engineer (RTE)/Scrum MasterLocation: Fountain Valley, CA Job description:SKILLS REQUIRED:Leadership Skills: A strong leader with the capacity to motivate and influence teams is required for an effective RTE. They provide a good example and embody the concepts of Agile and Lean thinking. Problem-Solving and Critical Thinking: An RTE must be able to assess complicated challenges, identify root causes, and provide effective solutions. They should be knowledgeable about root cause analysis approaches. Communication Skills: Communication must be clear, straightforward, and compassionate. The RTE must effectively communicate with teams, stakeholders, and leadership to ensure alignment and understanding. Technical Knowledge: While not necessarily required, having technical knowledge or experience in software development can be beneficial in understanding the ART s work and effectively conducting technical talks. Organizational Change Management: The RTE is frequently used to guide firms through Agile transitions. Understanding the principles and techniques of change management is advantageous. Conflict Resolution: Conflicts can occur inside teams as well as at the program level. To maintain a harmonious and productive atmosphere, the RTE must be skilled in dispute resolution and negotiation.
